text: 6.23 2 Sto 36.16, Mat 5.12, Apo 5.41, 7.52, Kol 1.24, Jem 1.2 Bɨlel nɨsed yes kɨli okok, kɨli bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok kɨlop gelɨgɨpal tek nep nɨbop gɨnɨgabal agak. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, God chɨnop man ne alaŋ dad amɨl dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agɨl, tep gaknɨŋ ñɨn pakɨlɨg, nɨbop tep yɨbɨl gek mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg yenɨmɨb agak.
